com.inmobi.monetization

Class IMInterstitial

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.inmobi.monetization.IMInterstitial

  • public class IMInterstitial
extends Object
    Class to get interstitial ads in an application. Create an instance of IMInterstitial and load interstitial ad. Once loaded, show an interstitial ad.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  IMInterstitial.State
      Enum to get the state of the Interstitial Ad

      Create IMInterstitial instance

    • Method Detail

      • getState

        public IMInterstitial.State getState()
        Get the current state of the interstitial ad.
        Returns:
        state of the interstitial ad.

      • loadInterstitial

        public void loadInterstitial()
        Loads a new interstitial ad. Ad will not be loaded if the previous ad is currently being loaded, or if the previous ad is being viewed by the user.

      • stopLoading

        public void stopLoading()
        Cancel the ad request. If ad fetch is in progress at the time of this call, an ad request failed callback is called with error (AD_FETCH_TIMEOUT)
        If ad load/render is in progress at the time of this call, an ad request failed callback is called with error (AD_RENDERING_TIMEOUT).
        Other cases does nothing

      • setIMInterstitialListener

        public void setIMInterstitialListener(IMInterstitialListener listener)
        Set the IMInterstitialListener for receiving interstitial ad callbacks.
        Parameters:
        listener -

      • disableHardwareAcceleration

        public void disableHardwareAcceleration()
        Calling this method will disable hardware acceleration on the underlying views. Once disabled, it cannot be enabled.

      • destroy

        @Deprecated
public void destroy()
        Deprecated. 
        This method is deprecated. Calling this method will not have any effect.

      • setAppId

        public void setAppId(String appId)
        Set app id for the IMInterstitial instance. Call this method if more than one appId is present in your app. If mediation is being used, calling this method will result in a no-operation.
        Parameters:
        appId -

      • setSlotId

        public void setSlotId(long slotId)
        Set slotId for mediation/actions users
        Parameters:
        slotId - set -1 to switch to remove slotId

      • show

        public void show()
        Show the interstitial ad. The state of the interstitial must be 'READY' to show the ad.

      • show

        @Deprecated
public void show(long animationTimeInMillis)
        Deprecated. 
        Show the interstitial ad with animation. The state of the interstitial must be 'READY' to show the ad. This method is deprecated. Please use show()

      • setIMIncentivisedListener

        public void setIMIncentivisedListener(IMIncentivisedListener listener)
        Set the incentivised listener if rewarded ads are configured
        Parameters:
        listener -

      • setKeywords

        public void setKeywords(String keywords)
        Set the keywords. Will be passed in the ad request
        Parameters:
        keywords -

      • setRequestParams

        public void setRequestParams(Map<String,String> requestParams)
        Set the request params. Will be passed in the ad request
        Parameters:
        requestParams -

      • setRefTagParam

        @Deprecated
public void setRefTagParam(String key,
                             String value)
        Deprecated. 
        This method is deprecated. Use setRequestParams to set the key value params to be sent in the adrequest
